thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 22 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: Samsung Electronics says U.S. tariffs on washers a great loss for American consumers

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Samsung Electronics says U.S. tariffs on washers a great loss for American consumers
text:
SEOUL (Reuters) - Samsung Electronics said on Tuesday a U.S. government decision to impose tariffs on washing machines was a great loss for American consumers and workers.
“Everyone will pay more with fewer choices,” the South Korean company said in a statement.
U.S. President Donald Trump has approved recommendations to impose safeguard tariffs on imported large residential washing machines and imported solar cells and modules, U.S. Trade Representative Robert Lighthizer said earlier on Monday.
Reporting by Ju-min Park; Editing by Paul Tait
